resources.string:
You have to chose a person that will show the slogans to the rest.

 Then the person draws the slogan and starts to show it.

 He has only 2 minutes to make the slogan guessed.

 The person that guessed the slogan correct is the next to show.

Divide yourselves into 2 teams.

 Each team chooses the person that will show the slogans.

 Delegates stand before teams and draw slogans to show and start showing - each person shows slogan to his team.

 If the teams guessed their slogan - they get the point, but if they guessed the enemies slogan - the enemies get the point
